observation: Home | Excel Securities & Associates, Inc  (800) 323-3746 Menu Home About Us Our Story Services Our Associates Affiliated Offices Client Corner Client Resources COVID-19 Business Resources Articles & Videos Tools Helpful Links Disclosures Advisor Portal Advisor Overview Practice Management Industry News Advisor Resources News Account Access Contact Experience the Excel Difference Excel Securities & Associates, Inc. is an independent, full-service Broker-Dealer / Registered Investment Advisor (RIA) financial firm. For 46 years, our team of professionals has provided personalized service that sets us apart. We look forward to getting to know you. LEARN MORE ABOUT US Individual Investors Our independent advisors offer clear and consistent guidance to clients in all phases of life. To accomplish this, we educate clients on the complexities of contemporary financial issues. To earn and keep a client's trust, we nurture each relationship to promote an understanding of our capabilities with a relentless commitment to integrity, objectivity, and sincerity. Learn more Financial Advisors Work with a Broker-Dealer who will provide you with a full suite of tools. Our superior technology, personal support, and sensible compliance will support your growing practice. INTERESTED IN JOINING OUR TEAM? Companies Since 1999, our Qualified Retirement Plan team demonstrates the same service philosophy when delivering its innovative Fiduciary Solution Tool to entrepreneurs and executives. Have a question? Fill out our form and we will be happy to get back to you with an answer. Name Email Address Phone Question Toll-Free: (800) 323-3746 Office: (585) 424-1234 200 Canal View Boulevard Suite 204 Rochester, NY 14623 support@excelsecurities.com Quick Links Retirement Investment Estate Insurance Tax Money Lifestyle All Articles All Videos All Calculators Check the background of your financial professional on FINRA's BrokerCheck The content is developed from sources believed to be providing accurate information.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered and has been around since 1998, with an expiration date in 2025. The registrant information is redacted for privacy, which is not uncommon due to privacy concerns. The domain status is clientTransferProhibited, which is a normal status indicating that the domain cannot be transferred without the owner's consent. The presence of a long-standing domain and the absence of immediate red flags in the WHOIS information suggest legitimacy, but I should verify the website's claims and look for additional evidence of a potential scam.

Having found no immediate signs of scam characteristics and considering the evidence of the company's legitimacy from multiple sources, I now know the final answer.
